pullrequest.title: qtutils 2.0.0 support and experimental PyQt5 support

content.raw: I've verified communication with child processes works - I've been 'running experiments' with the dummy pseudoclock device. I also have a patch to the PulseBlaster device file that mocks calls to the spinapi, and I've run that too with no pulseblaster actually present, and the status checks during manual mode worked.
content.html: I've verified communication with child processes works - I've been 'running experiments' with the dummy pseudoclock device. I also have a patch to the PulseBlaster device file that mocks calls to the spinapi, and I've run that too with no pulseblaster actually present, and the status checks during manual mode worked.
